content.en: Haze removal advancements: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the process of removing haze from images. These algorithms aim to overcome the limitations of current methods and achieve more accurate and visually appealing results. They use techniques such as combining different models, introducing negative correction, improving transmission estimation, and utilizing scene-wise approaches to enhance the dehazing process. These advancements in algorithms contribute to faster processing times and better image restoration in real-time systems.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for tågefjernelse: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre processen med at fjerne tåge fra billeder. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at overvinde begrænsningerne ved nuværende metoder og opnå mere nøjagtige og visuelt tiltalende resultater. De anvender teknikker såsom at kombinere forskellige modeller, introducere negativ korrektion, forbedre transmission estimering, og bruge scenebaserede tilgange for at optimere tågefjernelsesprocessen. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmer bidrager til hurtigere behandlingstider og bedre billedrestaurering i realtidssystemer.
